title: Got to Be Real
description: Boldly sexy, raucously funny, and unfailingly honest-all readers will be able to identify with, and fall in love with, these original stories from the hottest male voices in African-American Fiction. E. Lynn Harris... A wonderful writer. (San Francisco Chronicle)Eric Jerome Dickey... His characters sing with realism. (USA Today)Colin Channer...He's Bob Marley with a pen. (Kwame Dawes)Marcus Major... He has a gift for dialogue. (Kirkus Reviews)
author: Eric Jerome Dickey
